abilities.name: The Betrayer
abilities.rule: At the end of your Charge phase, if this model is leading a unit and that unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you must take a Leadership test for this model. If that test is failed, one Bodyguard model in that unit is destroyed.

abilities.name: Berzerker Frenzy
abilities.rule: The first time this model is destroyed, at the end of the phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, with 3 wounds remaining.

abilities.name: Legendary Killer
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.
